main.name: Hari Setiawan
main.description: I am a freelance developer currently residing in South Korea
main.bio: I am a quick to learn person and willing to discover and accept new ideas. I got my CS degree in Indonesia, then I got my Master's degree in Pusan National University recently. I have worked as a software engineer in different places for six years. Mostly I used PHP frameworks such as Laravel and Codeigniter, otherwise I used Nodejs and GraphQL to build an API. I also work with C++ to develop desktop apps. In my spare time, I like to create some utility tools for my daily purposes(e.g: data visualization, web crawler, etc) using Python or Javascript. Currently, I am focused on learning React Native to develop cross-platform apps. Additionally, I'm also interested to work with Web 3.0 technology especially Blockchain (e.g: Smart contract, Bitcoin)
main.contactmessage: If you have any inquiry you can contact me by email

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: While here, I spent most of my time learning database systems and blockchain (Solidity and Hyperledger fabric). Since then, I am looking forward to utilizing the blockchain's nature which is secure and decentralized. Under the supervision and guidance of Prof. Hong Bonghee, I was working to develop several projects in C++. These projects are including but are not limited to vessel simulation and rule engine visualization desktop applications.

Here I found my passion to dive into the software engineering path. I studied a lot about a good database design, the importance of a fault-tolerance database, etc. I finished my thesis with a topic about emotion recognition from text using the ensemble method.

work.company: Big Data and Database Lab (Pusan National University)
work.title: Research Assistant
work.description: I gained a lot of experienced working with Windows development environment here. I was working to develop a vessel simulation program in C++ using MFC framework. In addition, I had to optimize the program operation by using index structure, including R-Tree and TPR-Tree. These two indexes works excellent with spatial data; Advised by: Prof. Hong Bonghee

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: I gained most of my development experience here since I had joined Medify.id from the beginning as a startup company. I worked to develop a hospital information system from the bottom using Laravel with my team. Since Medify.id focuses on the medical field system, I had to build an API system to receive the data provided by laboratory devices. I also had the chance to develop the API using Node.js for the mobile application.

work.title: Software Engineer Internship
work.description: Working for a mature startup company gave me a big insight into being a software engineer. Here, I gained a chance to develop an HTML email template generator that can adapt to various marketing requirements using Codeigniter. I also learn how continuous integration and deployment are used, so the company website can continue serving without downtime while adding new features. Jenkins, containerization, and testing working together to make continuous integration possible.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Here, I learned for the first time how to build a real-world project. I built a startup website for online book rental using the Codeigniter framework.

skills.name: Javascript (React, React Native, Node.js)
skills.content: Due to the technology these days, I have been using Javascript both in frontend and backend. In my early days, I mostly used Javascript to provide the interaction in the website. Later, I've been using Node.js with Express framework to built a reliable API accompanied with React as its frontend. Nowadays, I'm looking to improve my skill by using React Native to develop a mobile apps.

projects.title: Wenak
projects.description: A website to explore any recipes based on your needs. This website is built using Django and MongoDB with public dataset
